string.text: Get Next Task
I have another job waiting. I should get to it.
I want you to meet with someone. He is no friend of mine but he could use your assistance.
Good luck stalker.
Assassination for Lukash
Lukash has a target he needs eliminated.
Hey, I'm glad you came. I have something I need you to do for me. There is a mutual enemy of ours that needs to be eliminated. He is dangerous. Take him down immediately.
Awesome bro! Thanks.
Freedom Assault on Monolith
Lukash has asked me to lead Freedom in an assault against the Monolith.

Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I've recruited an assault squad and want you to lead them in an invasion on Monolith territory. Take them out.
Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
Search Lab X-8
Search Lab X-8 in Outskirts for evidence of Clear Sky occupation.

I have received information that former members of Clear Sky might have occupied Lab X-8 some time ago. I need you to investigate the Lab and see if you can recover any documents they might have left there.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce me to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a Free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys, and I'll happily introduce you.

Good work. You're finally free. A word of warning, though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Freedom!
Lukash will introduce me to Freedom's way of life for a token sum of 15,000 RU.

Heh, and I guess you're looking for a sweet taste of Freedom, aren't you? Yeah, I can sort you out. Just ask yourself one thing - "Do I have what it takes to be a badass"? Because you gotta have stones bigger than Death Lamps to roll with us. We have lots of good times here, sure, but when shit hits the fan, you gotta be ready to help defend your brothers against fanatics, fascists, governments...\n \nWe fight for a Free Zone. If you're serious about helping us set up an Anarchist Utopia here, kindly set aside 15,000 RU for the boys, and I'll happily introduce you.

Good work. You're finally free. A word of warning, though - anyone who disrupts the freedom of my boys tends to wind up sleeping in the Bloodsucker Village. Remember to be considerate of others around here.
Destroy the Enemy Detachment
A detachment of stalkers has been causing problems for Freedom's friends. Lukash is offering a bounty to whoever takes these punks out.

Do you feel like helping Freedom for a reward? We've got some damn punks who won't settle down, and it's time to teach them a lesson. These rascals have been sneaking into our territory. They have been shooting at our friends. And, to top it all off, they have the gall to gaslight my men! It's time to give them a lethal education on personal space. Can you do it?
Ah, great! Maybe now we'll get some goddamn peace and quiet around here, eh?
Raid the Enemy
I have been tasked to raid enemy territory for Freedom. I should report back to Lukash after the job is done.

I have a dangerous but important mission if you are willing. With Monolith to the north and Duty to the south, things are getting a little claustrophobic for my liking. I need a certified badass to raid an enemy camp and give us more breathing room. Do you dare to be that badass?
Ha! You actually did it, you mad man! Here, you've earned this, along with my respect.
Eliminate the Monolith Convert
A Freedom member has converted to the Monolith. Lukash has tasked me with finding and killing him.

I've got some real heavy news, man. One of our Freedom fighters has fallen under the influence of the Monolith. He was a good man, and I know he wouldn't have wanted to continue living as some alien crystal's brainwashed killer. Please, find him and take him down. Otherwise, his old friends are going to have to do it.
It's done? Good. I know this was rough. Our brothers at the Barrier will drink to their fallen comrade. As for you, here's your payment.
Deal with the Problematic Stalker
Lukash will reward me for capping a troublesome stalker.
There's a fellow who's walking around not far from here. He shot one of ours down once. And something like that cannot be forgiven. Will you take the job to whack him? We'll pay, don't worry.
Hell yeah! That'll teach 'em to mess with us. Here's your reward, as I promised. Good job, stalker.
Bring Lukash a Reliable %s
Lukash has asked me to find a specific firearm in mint condition. I should return to him as soon as I find what he wants.

While Freedom's benefactors keep the lads supplied with the weaponry they need, I could really do with a new %s for personal reasons. If you happen to find one in excellent condition, I would be willing to give you a substantial payment for it.

While Freedom's benefactors keep the lads supplied with the weaponry they need, I could really do with a new %s for personal reasons. If you happen to find one in excellent condition, I would be willing to give you a substantial payment for it.
Well done. This new shooter will make an enormous difference should the worst come to pass. Here is the payment I promised.
Trigger Happy
Lukash is promoting aggression against some of Freedom's enemies. I can bring %s to him for a sweet bounty.

Well, right now, we're stuck in a hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, zealots to the north, extremists to the south, and sprinkle in some military goons for good measure. How about you explain to them what we think of their edicts and commands the old-fashioned way? There'll be a sweet reward at the end for you, don't worry.

Well, right now, we're stuck in a hammer and anvil situation. Y'know, zealots to the north, extremists to the south, and sprinkle in some military goons for good measure. How about you explain to them what we think of their edicts and commands the old-fashioned way? After you've finished humiliating them, bring me %ses as trophies. There'll be a sweet reward at the end for you, don't worry.
Hey, nice job, man. Here's your money.

Hey man. Here's a thing. Remember those Sin folks? They didn't get the memo the last time you kicked their collective asses, so I think it's high time for an encore. Loki said they've been spotted being unruly in Zaton, especially around the area of abandoned substation workshops. Go put them down.

Some of the newer stalkers among Freedom are starting to think you're the Second Coming of Rambo. That you keep coming back alive and well from jobs like this makes me think they may be onto something. So here. A little something for our Rambo.
Zoneraker
A Freedom spy needs to be extracted from an enemy faction. I'll need to kill the other members of the squad, then escort him back to the base. The spy has an SVD.

One of my best men is currently hiding out among the enemy, trying to learn their secrets. He's usually a solid guy, so when he begins missing our contact times, I begin to worry. I have a hunch he's been ratted out, and that the squad he's with is now quietly waiting for the perfect opportunity to silence him permanently. We need to get him home. He left me a location ping, but he's with other stalkers. You need to take care of them and bring my man back in one piece. You will recognize him by his rifle, an SVD. He will have to shoot at you to maintain his deception when you attack the group, but he won't be aiming too well, so don't hold a grudge.
Fine work. Time to grease this guy's nuts for his knowledge.

Hey man, stop! I'm the Freedom spy! Sorry for taking potshots at you. I had to keep my cover just in case...luckily you made it. If you bring me to Army Warehouses safely, Lukash will reward you well. Lead the way, I'll follow!
Thanks for pulling my nuts out of the fire, stalker! See you around!
Why We Can't Have Nice Things
Lukash has asked me to destroy the military vehicles in Cordon before they do any damage in the Zone. I'll need to bring explosives.

Do you have explosives? If so, I've got a big job for you. Right now, the military is bringing armoured vehicles into the Zone to reinforce their troops. I ask you, is this fair? Look at the rusty, dysfunctional pieces of junk we have rotting in our warehouses! If we can't have tanks that work in the Zone, then neither can the government! My spies say these vehicles are arriving to be stationed at the Cordon checkpoint as we speak. Don't worry, they'll make sure the vehicles are unmanned when you pay your visit, so you can destroy them without being turned into swiss cheese. You want in? Then pack your pineapples and get going!
Bring Wild Game for Freedom
Skinflint said he'd pay me to bring him %s. Time to go hunting.
I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?

So, some of the guys are planning a dinner party to celebrate Bob Marley's birthday. Better late than never, right? Anyways, the more meat we can get for the feast, the better - so if you are out and about, bring me enough %s, and I'll make it worth your while. Jah will never forget you!
Ah, this'll make for a fine meal once the chef gets his hands on it. Here's your payment. Why not buy some vodka and celebrate?
Deliver Locked Case to Skinflint
Skinflint has a delivery that needs to be picked up.

One of our couriers was supposed to bring a package through today. Sadly, they had to hide it somewhere safe when a Duty patrol caught wind of them. They sent me the stash coordinates before going invisible on the network, so if you're willing to walk on over and finish the job by fetching the goods, I'll give you a cut of their pay.
Let's take a look-see...ah yes. Just what we needed. Thank you stalker, here's your cut of the pay.
Phantoms in the Dark
Skinflint will pay me to stop a terrible mutant that haunts the Bloodsucker Village. I'll need to keep myself alert.

Sleep has been a little harder around camp lately. Each night we hear screaming, but before we can do anything about it, yet another one of our men on the road gets swallowed by the darkness. We find their mangled remains strewn about the Bloodsucker Village the next day.
 
Lukash thinks a rare breed of bloodsucker may be in town. A darker, stronger, more vicious motherfucker that only comes out at night. A few of our war-dogs think we should cease night hikes until it migrates and hopefully starts messing up Duty instead, believing it's too risky for us to go after it directly.
 
Well, I say if you've got the stones to wait for it in the Village after nightfall, I'd be thrilled to shower you in roubles for killing the bastard, and the rest of the lads around here will be grateful to get a good night's sleep again. Or at least as good as sleep gets this close to the Brain Scorcher.
Wow, you actually did it! You lunatic. I'll let the camp know the good news. Glad we have a hunter like you around.
Scarce Supplies
Skinflint needs %s to help keep Freedom's medic stocked. I've agreed to help him.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em.

Yeah. You know how rough and tumble life can be in Freedom, right? Dodging bullets and fighting fanatics is just part of the daily life around here. As badass as it makes Freedom's fighters feel, it also means we're getting short on meds. Since Solid is too high off his ass to organize medical supplies, that responsibility now falls to me. If you can help out by bringing in some %s, you'd have Freedom's gratitude. And some of my roubles.
Ah, brilliant. I'll make sure these stay out of Solid's sight until his patients need it. Thanks a lot, stalker.
Amass Equipment for Freedom Infiltration

Well, there is something important that needs looking at. A special infiltration mission to Rostok is planned, I must keep the details secret sorry. We need some equipment to perfect the disguise of our special operatives in order for them to blend in perfectly. We need 5.45x39 HP rounds, about 10 full boxes, so that they can defend themselves against mutants on the road to Rostok without alerting the checkpoint guards. If things go south our men will need some army grade medical supplies as well, 5 complete army medkits should do. Don't fret, your payment will be adequate. If you go the extra mile and get some cocaine and some porn mags, you'll even get a bonus, this should help our operatives to bribe some Duty members to accomplish their mission. So, you in?
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install basic equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.

Yo! Some bandits were supposed to give us some new tools from Dark Valley, but they never showed! Eh, they were probably bullshitting anyway, but if you manage to find some bog-standard, entry-level tools, bring them here as quick as you can. You'd be well paid for your help.
Good! Once you find some %s, I can finally get the ball rolling around here.
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install advanced equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.

Yeah, you know what isn't right? We're sitting right in the middle of one of the government's old armouries - it was a real storehouse for their special forces, back in the day. Yet half the amazing gear they left behind has just been lying around, rusting to shit because we don't have the proper tools to maintain everything.\n \nWe should change that. Bring me another toolkit - something more advanced this time. It's time to show the Man we can run His war machines better than He can!
Thanks. If you manage to come through for me on this, I'll be able to perform more intricate upgrades on your equipment in future, too.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks again, man.
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install expert equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.

Well, the bad news is most of the big guns stashed in the armoury really can't be saved at this point. The good news is this - I could do some real nice calibrations on the equipment we do have working, even our exoskeletons. What I'll need, though, is a more precise set of tools.\n \nCare to help Freedom tech up one more time? The reward will be even better than last time, and I'll throw in some field maintenance lessons for good measure!
Ha! You absolute mad lad! Well, go on then. Once you're back with some expert tools, I will show you what a talented mechanic can do.
Man, Freedom's gonna love this. Shotguns with parachutes! Armoured SMGs! I'll make it happen! Here's your cash, for a job well done.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of Monolith soldiers is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a Monolith attack.
Monolith? I'll pass...
Whoa, free money. Here I come!
I wasn't planning to go to the Army Warehouses any time soon anyway.
Rewarded how? Cash, artefacts, guns? I'm not going to drag my ass there for just some vodka.
Damn! I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Killing Monolith? I'll do it for free, damn fuckers.
Can I keep what I find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help defend the Barrier.

Excellent, the scouts reported several Monolith squads approaching and any extra gun is welcome. Get in position and wait for the fanatics to show up, simple right? If you feel it's becoming too much and decide to run we won't hold it on you but of course you can forget the reward.
The Barrier is safe.. for now at least.
Good shooting stalker, this should cover some of the lead you put in those bastards. And a little extra to relax. Glad we had you around!
The scouts say they're on the move right now, everybody get in position!
Oh damn, watch out! They got an RPG!
This ain't summer camp stalker. Be thankful there's people with more balls than you to keep your lot safe.
Good job brothers, and thanks to all the volunteers that didn't run away. Come back to me for your reward.
To every friendly Stalker reading this, a large group of zombies is approaching the Barrier, any help will be appreciated and rewarded.
Defend the Barrier
Freedom is asking for help to repel a zombie attack.
Poor things...
I'll pass, just doesn't feel right.
Well, at least it isn't Monolith.
This better be worth it, last time I spent more bullets than what I got in return.
Damn! I'm too far, I'd get there when it's all over already. Wanted to test my new rifle.
Zombies from the Radar? Damn... my friend went there just a few days ago.
Can I keep what I find on the bodies?
I've heard your transmission, I have come to help fighting the zombies.
Very well, usually they dont put up much of a fight but we are short on manpower thanks to Monolith and those pretend soldiers, it should be as easy as shooting at the range.
The horde is breaking through, everybody get in position!
Don't they ever end?
What is it, scared of things that can barely shoot back?
Good job brothers, finally they can rest in peace. Volunteers, come back to me for your reward.
They're all dead, for real now.

Very well, hope you didn't recognize anyone in there. Sometimes people come back from the Barrier more shaken up than when fighting Monolith. Let's have a drink at those poor souls, and something to help you not end up like them.
Hold on guys, we're coming to help!
We just departed from the base, we'll be there soon.
Is it that bad over there? I though you were enough!
It has already begun! Come on guys move your ass or we'll miss all the action!
Find %s for Solid
A %s is required by Solid for his work on medical supplies. I should bring it back to him if I find one.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

You bet your sweet ass there is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain just the right cocktail of ingredients I need to make all sorts of drugs. For medicinal use, of course. I know the things some of the lads around here say about me. Don't listen to that bullshit. All I need is some decent kit, and I'll be able to get my little clinic into decent shape again.
Great job! I owe you big time.
